page.title: 17Leek Show
page.content: People from the area go to Leek Show which is an annual agricultural show and is held on the last Saturday in July at the Birchall Playing Fields in Leek. There are lots of competitions for farm animals and for pets. There are also competitions for flower arranging, garden produce and craft work. There are charity side-shows and take-away food and drink stalls. There is a large exhibition ring in which many displays take place during the afternoon. Show jumping competitions are also part of the procedings. Many local firms have displays there, especially of farm machinery and cars. The Manifold Show is a similar, but smaller event held at Hulme End.
